physical_appearance:The prayer rug is pink in colour. It is rectangular in shape. Near the bottom of the prayer rug
 there is an outline design of a mihrab with minarets on the side. A border that is golden in colour can be seen. It contains a geometrical shape as its pattern.

 Prayer Islam Islamic prayers and devotions Motifs
subject_terms_3:Islam
sgcool_label_text:This janamaz (Persian/Urdu: prayer mat) is a fine example of a zari-woven silk textile. The central motif appears to be a stylised
 almost minimalistic
 version of a mihrab with minarets on the side
 surrounded by a geometric border. Prayer mats of this fine quality would have most likely been used by the upper classes or by royalty.\r\n

metadata.physical_appearance: The prayer rug is pink in colour. It is rectangular in shape. Near the bottom of the prayer rug, there is an outline design of a mihrab with minarets on the side. A border that is golden in colour can be seen. It contains a geometrical shape as its pattern.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This janamaz (Persian/Urdu: prayer mat) is a fine example of a zari-woven silk textile. The central motif appears to be a stylised, almost minimalistic, version of a mihrab with minarets on the side, surrounded by a geometric border. Prayer mats of this fine quality would have most likely been used by the upper classes or by royalty.
